section.name: Functional Requirements
section.snippet: FR-001: (MVP) Users can input text notes into the application. FR-21: (MVP) The system provides a radically simple and intuitive user interface.

section.name: web_app Specific Requirements - Platform Support
section.snippet: Responsive Design: The application should be fully responsive and function well across various screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).

section.name: Epic 1: Foundation & Core Content Input
section.snippet: Goal: Establish the basic application infrastructure and allow users to provide content for processing.

section.name: Story 1.2: (MVP) Text Input Interface
section.snippet: User Story: As a user, I want to paste or type my notes into a dedicated text area, so that I can easily provide content for summarization. Acceptance Criteria: Prominent and usable text area, text is visible/editable, "Generate" prepares text.

section.name: Project Initialization
section.snippet: The project will be initialized using Next.js (JavaScript), Tailwind CSS, and Headless UI.

section.name: Technology Stack Details - Core Technologies
section.snippet: Frontend: Next.js (JavaScript), React, Tailwind CSS, Headless UI.

section.name: Consistency Rules - Naming Conventions
section.snippet: Frontend React Components: PascalCase. JS Functions/Variables: camelCase.

section.name: Consistency Rules - Code Organization
section.snippet: Frontend `app/` for pages, `components/` for reusable UI, `lib/` for utilities, `hooks/` for custom hooks, `styles/` for global styles.

section.name: Consistency Rules - Testing Strategy
section.snippet: Frontend Unit/Component Tests: For React components using `Jest` and `React Testing Library`.

doc.title: Epic Technical Specification: Foundation & Core Content Input

section.name: Detailed Design - Services and Modules
section.snippet: Frontend: `app/(input)/page.jsx` for text/PDF input UI. `components/InputForm.jsx` for text area and PDF upload button. `lib/api.js` for calling FastAPI backend.

section.name: Detailed Design - Workflows and Sequencing
section.snippet: User interaction: user types text, clicks "Generate". Frontend to Backend: `POST /api/upload/text`. Frontend displays loading indicator.

section.name: Non-Functional Requirements - Performance
section.snippet: Frontend UI should remain responsive with loading indicators during backend processing (NFR1 from PRD, implemented via FastAPI async/WebSockets).

section.name: Executive Summary
section.snippet: Core Experience: Effortless knowledge transformation, with "Generate Summaries" as critical interaction.

section.name: 4.1 Chosen Design Approach
section.snippet: Feature-forward (Guided) for input screen. Emphasizes clarity, support, proactive onboarding.

section.name: User Journey: Generate Multi-level Summaries
section.snippet: User inputs content, clicks "Generate Summaries". System displays progress indicator. Error States: Informative error message + Retry button.
